desc: High-pressure fine water fire extinguishing system is a new technology of water fire extinguishing system. It is a fixed fire extinguishing system in which water is pressurized to more than 10MPa by high-pressure pump, sprayed through a special nozzle, strongly rubbed with air and torn into fine water mist.

layout.text: CITYPOWER Tunnel Water Mist Fire Extinguishing
Safe and efficient water mist makes tunnel fire safer, faster and more effective.
